name: Back Alley Dice Rolling Simulator '22
description:
Learn the ins & outs of modern day Back Alley Dice Rolling!

Explore alleys, meet quirky characters, and resolve conflicts in this hyperrealistic dice rolling simulator!

Made in 24 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Controls
  • Mouse: Make Decisions / Roll Dice / Resolve Conflicts
Credits & Thanks

Programming, Design: Damon Bolesta

Thanks to...

freesound.org for always being there when I need free sounds (.org)

  • Conflict Resolution music
  • Alley Background Sounds

Dice graphics from Kenney's Boardgame Pack

You, for playing!

Game made in Unity.
